Package architecture

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • architecture.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Objects describing an action that a component can perform.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Action.ActionType
      All possible actions that a component can perform.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action​(Action.ActionType action,
              Component component,
              Variable var,
              Equation eq,
              Component comPartner,
              java.util.Set<Variable> varSet,
              java.util.Set<Equation> eqSet,
              java.util.Set<Statement> stSet,
              Proof pro,
              Attest att)
        The full Constructor of an Action that is typically only invoked in this class by the other constructors.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed
        component - the component that executes the action
        var - a variable that is possessed or transmitted
        eq - an equation that computed or transmitted
        comPartner - the component that is interacted with
        varSet - a set of variables that is transmitted
        eqSet - a set of equations that is transmitted
        stSet - a set of statements that is transmitted
        pro - a proof that is transmitted
        att - an attestation that is transmitted

      • Action

        public Action​(Action.ActionType action,
              Component component,
              Variable var)
        Constructor called for Action = HAS or DELETE.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed (has | delete)
        component - the component that executes the action
        var - the variable that is possessed / deleted

        public Action​(Action.ActionType action,
              Component component,
              Component comPartner,
              java.util.Set<Statement> stSet,
              java.util.Set<Variable> varSet)
        Constructor called for Action = RECEIVE.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed (receive)
        component - the receiving component
        comPartner - the sending component
        stSet - a list of statements (can be empty)
        varSet - a list of variables

        component - the component that executes the action
